PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-12262023-12-08ESDC
ActApprentice Loans Act
SubjectOrder Approving the Terms and Conditions in Apprentice Loan Agreements
PrecisOrder approving the revision of terms and conditions of the Canada Apprentice Loan Application and Agreement in order to reflect the permanent elimination of interest accrual on Canada Apprentice Loans as of April 1, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the revision of terms and conditions of the Canada Apprentice Loan Application and Agreement in order to reflect the permanent elimination of interest accrual on Canada Apprentice Loans as of April 1, 2023.
